sub_title: retired 1988 and 1998 at resp. Shell and Technical University,Delft
summary:
-1955 Doctorandus degree geology,structural geology,etc.Leiden University, Publ. thesis in French, 
-1956 Exploration- and photogeologist Anglo American Corporation of South Africa in Zambia.
-1960-1964 Expl. field geologist Shell International Petroleum Company. Fieldwork Sahara.
-1964-1970 Production geologist Brunei Shelle petroleum Company, Sulanate Brunei, NW Borneo.
-1970-1973 Division Geologist Shell International Petroleum Company The Hague, Netherlands.
-1973-1977 Staff lecturer Production Geology Shell Training Centre, The Hague, Netherlands
-1977-1982 Senior production geologist in the Venezuela Studies Team (Shell, the Hague).
-1977-82 Senior production geologist in the Venezuela Studies Team (Shell, the Hague). 
-1982-1983 Senior production geologist  with Shell UK, London. Offshore  oil-and  gas fields.
-1983-1986 Head of the Venezuela Studies Team (Shell, the Hague, Petroleum engineering studie).
-1986-1988 Consultant Area Product  (Shell, the Hague), UK, Norway, Denmark, Italy, South America, Australia, Malaysia, Indonesia, New Zealand, Japan and China.  Retirement June 1988.
-1988-1998 Petroleum Geology Consultant (independent, Voorschoten, Netherlands).  International assignments Shell Thailand Bangkok,Shell Expro London,Lazards et Frères, ABN-AMRO, Amsterdam, Paris, Russian Federation/Western Siberia. Author of SIPM-commissioned handbook "Structural Styles of Selected Fields with a Shell Group interest". Co-editor of "Geology of Gas and Oil under the Netherlands", published Kluwer Academic Publishers, 1996. 
Sept 1990 to june 1998, University Lecturer applied structural geology Technical University (TU)Delft, Mining Engineering Division, Earth Sciences Department. 
Stopped consulting activities in 1999				Voorschoten, 2014
